name: TypeAndQuantityNode
description: A structured value indicating the quantity, unit of measurement, and business function of goods included in a bundle offer.
title: TypeAndQuantityNode

fields.name: unitCode
fields.title: unitCode
fields.description: The unit of measurement given using the UN/CEFACT Common Code (3 characters) or a URL. Other codes than the UN/CEFACT Common Code may be used with a prefix followed by a colon.

fields.name: typeOfGood
fields.title: typeOfGood
fields.description: The product that this structured value is referring to.

fields.name: amountOfThisGood
fields.title: amountOfThisGood
fields.description: The quantity of the goods included in the offer.

fields.name: businessFunction
fields.title: businessFunction
fields.description: The business function (e.g. sell, lease, repair, dispose) of the offer or component of a bundle (TypeAndQuantityNode). The default is http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#Sell.

fields.name: unitText
fields.title: unitText
fields.description: A string or text indicating the unit of measurement. Useful if you cannot provide a standard unit code for unitCode.
